moves.1. e4 e5 2. d3: This move just blocks white's LSB
moves.2... Nf6 3. Bg5 Bc5 4. Nf3 Nc6 5. c3: I don't understand moves like this, it just robs the knight of its natural square.
moves.5... h6 6. Be3 Bb6: A useful trick I learned from Fiercequeen...
moves.8. Nbd2 d6 9. Nc4 Bg4 10. h3 Bxf3: It looks like we are heading into a cramped middle game. Knights will be doing the action...
moves.17. d4 Qa5 18. Bb5 Ne8: My knight is headed into action...
moves.19. Rda1 Rxa1 20. Rxa1 Nc7: Here I missed that he might play Nc2!!
moves.24. Ka3 Nc6 25. d5 Nd4: My knight is a powerhouse now...
moves.26... Ra8+: Bringing my rook into action with a tempo...
moves.27... Rxa4+ 28. Rxa4 Qb3#: There you have it. Until next time...
